revtext: Great experience at store, keep it up . Hospitable employee and nice   collections   . Good job Nishi keep it up
revreply: Thanks Saurabh for your review and kind words.   We relentlessly pursue the objective to ensure that we serve every person who   visits our showroom with compassion and patience.   We hold a very wide range of hair pieces to serve every possible requirement   and budget.   That is our forte.   We look forward to serving you again.
